headline: $280 Billion in Average Daily Processed Trade Volumes on Broadridge Distributed Ledger Repo Platform
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced its Distributed Ledger Repo (DLR) platform processed more than $280 billion in average daily repo transactions during the month of August ($5.9T), underscoring significant market adoption and the transformative potential of blockchain technology in capital markets. This innovative use of DLT is unlocking liquidity, creating efficiencies and optimizing opportunities for clients and the industry.
